type: Legendary Creature – Human Archer Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Liecester Lineage[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white and green Citizen creature token.
[i]Garreg Mach House Leader [/i]– Other creatures you control have skulk. If you control another Garreg Mach House Leader, creatures you control have reach and skulk.
